#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		if(n<=6)
		  cout<<"2"<<endl;
		else if(n<=75)
		  cout<<"3"<<endl;
		else if(n<=480)
		  cout<<"4"<<endl;
		else if(n<=2205)
		  cout<<"5"<<endl;
		else if(n<=8232)
		  cout<<"6"<<endl;
		else if(n<=26544)
		  cout<<"7"<<endl;
		else 
		  cout<<"8"<<endl;
	}
}
